name: solid
description: Makes writing JavaScript more strict by throwing errors when you initialise variables with invalid inputs.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:*.js && npm run build:*.min.js
scripts.build:*.js: browserify src/index.js -d -s solid | exorcist bin/solid.js.map | node tasks/header.js > bin/solid.js
scripts.build:*.min.js: browserify src/index.js -d -s solid | uglifyjs --mangle-props 2 -m -c drop_console=true | node tasks/header.js > bin/solid.min.js
